distances.primary

Class BhattacharyyaDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • distances.primary.DistanceMeasure
      • distances.primary.BhattacharyyaDistance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BhattacharyyaDistance
extends DistanceMeasure
implements java.io.Serializable
    Meant for measuring distances between probability distributions. This implementation does not assume that the histograms are normalized, so it includes divisions by the feature sums.
    See Also:
